list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small bowl-shaped container for drinking from, typically having a handle.
an ornamental trophy in the form of a cup, usually made of gold or silver and having a stem and two handles, awarded as a prize in a contest.
a mixed drink made from fruit juices and typically containing wine or cider.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bars offered large glasses of white wine cup
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các thanh cung cấp ly rượu vang lớn màu trắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: form (one's hand or hands) into the curved shape of a cup.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: “Hey!” Dad shouted, with his hands cupped around his mouth
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: "Này!" Bố hét lên, với hai tay ôm chặt miệng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bleed (someone) by using a glass in which a partial vacuum is formed by heating.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Dr. Ross ordered me to be cupped
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiến sĩ Ross đã ra lệnh cho tôi được sửa đổi
